scenes.description: 'Thanks for stepping up! But, really, are you sure you should be working now?' She raises an eyebrow and looks at [Bob].

options.text: It's fine, Monica. Let's just get this done efficiently.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and social skills, but empathy is lower as you focus on efficiency.

options.text: I hear you. Maybe we can split the task so itâ€™s less overwhelming.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and emotional perception by suggesting teamwork, but it may affect your self-regulation.

options.text: Let's just get started and see how it goes. We can adjust as needed.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation and social skills by being flexible, but emotional perception could be better.
